title: RaSP - Deep learning stability predictions
description: Pipeline version for predicting protein variants thermodynamic stability changes ( ΔΔG ) using a deep learning representation.

children.value: Preprint pipeline version for predicting protein variants

($\Delta \Delta G$) using a deep learning representation. The program, using as input a protein structure (uploaded as PDB) returns stability predictions ($\Delta \Delta G$ in kcal/mol) for each variant at each position of the query protein.
More details can be found in:
"Rapid protein stability prediction using deep learning representations"
. Source code is available on the project
